Instruction: Heat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius).
Dissolve soda in molasses in a medium bowl and stir until foamy. Add boiling water and a pinch of salt. In a separate bowl, combine flour, cinnamon, brown sugar, and butter to form crumbs.
Pour one-third of the molasses mixture onto the unbaked crust, sprinkle one-third of the crumbs over it, and repeat in layers until the top is covered with crumbs.
Place the pie in the preheated oven and bake for around 30 minutes, or until the topping and crust turn golden brown.
